cards.name: Mysterious Elf
cards.flavor_txt: You humans have... unusual tastes.

cards.name: Decoy
cards.flavor_txt: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.

cards.name: Biting Frost
cards.flavor_txt: Best part about frost - bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.

cards.name: Cirilla Fiona Elen Riannon
cards.flavor_txt: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing in them.

cards.name: Clear Weather
cards.flavor_txt: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope left after all...

cards.name: Commander's Horn
cards.flavor_txt: Plus one to morale, minus three to hearing.

cards.name: Dandelion
cards.flavor_txt: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a whoremonger, a liar - and my best friend.

cards.name: Emiel Regis Rohellec Terzieff
cards.flavor_txt: Men, the polite ones, at least would call me a monster. A blood-drinking freak.

cards.name: Geralt of Rivia
cards.flavor_txt: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.

cards.name: Impenetrable Fog
cards.flavor_txt: A good commander's dream... a bad one's horror.

cards.name: Scorch
cards.flavor_txt: Pillars of flame turn the mightiest to ash. All other tremble in shock and awe.

cards.name: Torrential Rain
cards.flavor_txt: Even the rain in this land smells like piss.

cards.name: Triss Merigold
cards.flavor_txt: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

cards.name: Vesemir
cards.flavor_txt: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.

cards.name: Villentretenmerth
cards.flavor_txt: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws... he's not the best at names.

cards.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
cards.flavor_txt: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

cards.name: Zoltan Chivay
cards.flavor_txt: Life without old mates and booze is like a woman without a rump.

cards.name: Olgierd von Everec
cards.flavor_txt: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.

cards.name: Gaunter O'Dimm
cards.flavor_txt: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.

cards.name: Gaunter O'Dimm - Darkness
cards.flavor_txt: Fear not the shadows, but the light.

cards.name: Cow
cards.flavor_txt: Mooo!

cards.name: Bovine Defense Force
cards.flavor_txt: Grrrrr!

cards.name: Foltest - King of Temeria
cards.flavor_txt: A well-aimed ballista razes not just the enemy's walls, but his morale as well.

cards.name: Foltest - Lord Commander of the North
cards.flavor_txt: A beautiful day for battle.

cards.name: Foltest - The Siegemaster
cards.flavor_txt: It is natural and beautiful that a man should love his sister.

cards.name: Foltest - The Steel-Forged
cards.flavor_txt: Sod advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.

cards.name: Foltest - Son of Medell
cards.flavor_txt: Dammit, I rule this land and I refuse to creep around its corners.

cards.name: Ballista
cards.flavor_txt: 'Usually we give 'em female names.' 'Like Jenny?' 'More like Bertha'

cards.name: Blue Stripes Commando
cards.flavor_txt: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly, though, I kill for her.

cards.name: Catapult
cards.flavor_txt: The gods help those who have better catapults.

cards.name: Crinfrid Reavers Dragon Hunter
cards.flavor_txt: Haven't had much luck with monsters of late, so we enlisted.

cards.name: Dethmold
cards.flavor_txt: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entails... Ah, good times...

cards.name: Dun Banner Medic
cards.flavor_txt: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.

cards.name: Esterad Thyssen
cards.flavor_txt: Like all Thyssen men, he was tall, powerfully built and criminally handsome.

cards.name: John Natalis
cards.flavor_txt: The square should bear the name of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.

cards.name: Kaedweni Siege Expert
cards.flavor_txt: 'You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.' 'Do what by the what now?'

cards.name: Kaedweni Siege Expert
cards.flavor_txt: 'You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.' 'Do what by the what now?'

cards.name: Kaedweni Siege Expert
cards.flavor_txt: 'You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.' 'Do what by the what now?'

cards.name: Keira Metz
cards.flavor_txt: If I'm to die today, I wish to look smashing for the occasion.

cards.name: Philippa Eilhart
cards.flavor_txt: Soon the power of kings will wither, and the Lodge shall seize its rightful place.

cards.name: Poor Fucking Infantry
cards.flavor_txt: I's a war veteran! ... spare me a crown?

cards.name: Prince Stennis
cards.flavor_txt: He ploughin' wears golden armor. Golden. 'course he's an arsehole.

cards.name: Redanian Foot Soldier
cards.flavor_txt: I've bled for Redania! I've killed for Redania... Dammit, I've even raped for Redania.

cards.name: Redanian Foot Soldier
cards.flavor_txt: I've bled for Redania! I've killed for Redania... Dammit, I've even raped for Redania.

cards.name: Sheldon Skaggs
cards.flavor_txt: I was there, on the front lines! Right were the fightin' was the thickest!

cards.name: Siege Tower
cards.flavor_txt: I love the clamor of siege towers in the morning. Sounds like victory.

cards.name: Siegfried of Denesle
cards.flavor_txt: We're on the same side, witcher. You'll realize this one day.

cards.name: Sigismund Dijkstra
cards.flavor_txt: Gwent's like politics, just more honest.

cards.name: Síle de Tansarville
cards.flavor_txt: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.

cards.name: Thaler
cards.flavor_txt: Fuck off! We aren't all ploughin' philanderers. Some of us have depth...

cards.name: Sabrina Glevissig
cards.flavor_txt: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.

cards.name: Vernon Roche
cards.flavor_txt: A patriot... and a real son of a bitch.

cards.name: Ves
cards.flavor_txt: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.

cards.name: Yarpen Zigrin
cards.flavor_txt: The world belongs to whoever's best at crackin' skulls and impregnatin' lasses.

cards.name: Trebuchet
cards.flavor_txt: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!

cards.name: Trebuchet
cards.flavor_txt: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!

cards.name: Emhyr var Emreis - His Imperial Majesty
cards.flavor_txt: A sword is but one of many tools at a ruler's disposal.

cards.name: Emhyr var Emreis - Emperor of Nilfgaard
cards.flavor_txt: The skies wept when my Pavetta died. They will not weep for me.

cards.name: Emhyr var Emreis - the White Flame
cards.flavor_txt: Your motives do not interest me. Only results.

cards.name: Emhyr var Emreis - The Relentless
cards.flavor_txt: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the headless.

cards.name: Emhyr var Emreis - Invader of the North
cards.flavor_txt: Emperors command multitudes, yet cannot control two things: their time and their hearts.

cards.name: Albrich
cards.flavor_txt: A fireball? Of course. Whatever Your Imperial Majesty wishes.

cards.name: Assire var Anahid
cards.flavor_txt: Nilfgaardian mages do have a choice: servile submission, or the gallows.

cards.name: Black Infantry Archer
cards.flavor_txt: I aim for the knee. Always.

cards.name: Black Infantry Archer
cards.flavor_txt: I aim for the knee. Always.

cards.name: Cahir Mawr Dyffryn aep Ceallach
cards.flavor_txt: His eyes flashed under his winged helmet. Fire gleamed form his sword's blade.

cards.name: Cynthia
cards.flavor_txt: Cynthia's talents can be deadly. She needs a tight leash.

cards.name: Etolian Auxiliary Archers
cards.flavor_txt: Double or nothing, aim for his cock.

cards.name: Etolian Auxiliary Archers
cards.flavor_txt: Double or nothing, aim for his cock.

cards.name: Fringilla Vigo
cards.flavor_txt: Magic is the highest good. It transcends all borders and divisions.

cards.name: Heavy Zerrikanian Fire Scorpion
cards.flavor_txt: Not the best for taking cities, but great for razing them to the ground.

cards.name: Impera Brigade Guard
cards.flavor_txt: The Impera Brigade never surrenders.Ever.

cards.name: Letho of Gulet
cards.flavor_txt: Witcher never die in their beds.

cards.name: Menno Coehoorn
cards.flavor_txt: I'll take attentive reconnaissance unit over a fine cavalry brigade any day.

cards.name: Morteisen
cards.flavor_txt: No Nordling pikemen or dwarven spearbearers can hope to best trained cavalry.

cards.name: Morvran Voorhis
cards.flavor_txt: Summer sun reflecting in the quiet waters of the Alba - that's Nilfgaard to me.

cards.name: Nausicaa Cavalry Rider
cards.flavor_txt: The Emperor will teach the North discipline.

cards.name: Puttkammer
cards.flavor_txt: Learned a lot at Braibant Military Academy. How to scrub potatoes, for instance.

cards.name: Rainfarn
cards.flavor_txt: You'll die as painfully as that pathetic traitor Windhalm did.

cards.name: Renuald aep Matsen
cards.flavor_txt: They say the Impera fear nothing. Untrue. Renuald scares them shitless.

cards.name: Rotten Mangonel
cards.flavor_txt: The rotten smell brings back childhood memories.

cards.name: Shilard Fitz-Oesterlen
cards.flavor_txt: Warfare is mere sound and fury - diplomacy is what truly shapes history.

cards.name: Siege Engineer
cards.flavor_txt: Wielded correctly, a protractor can be a deadly weapon.

cards.name: Siege Technician
cards.flavor_txt: I never miss twice.

cards.name: Stefan Skellen
cards.flavor_txt: My mark scars the face of our future empress. That is my proudest achievement.

cards.name: Sweers
cards.flavor_txt: And hands off the girl! Whatever we may be, we're not savages.

cards.name: Tibor Eggebracht
cards.flavor_txt: Albaaa! Forward!! Alba! Long live the Emperor!

cards.name: Vanhemar
cards.flavor_txt: For a fire mage, he's not very... flamboyant.

cards.name: Vattier de Rideaux
cards.flavor_txt: There's never been a problem a well-planned assassinations couldn't solve.

cards.name: Vreemde
cards.flavor_txt: Discipline is the Empire's deadliest weapon.

cards.name: Young Emissary
cards.flavor_txt: If i acquit myself well, perhaps next they'll post me somewhere civilized.

cards.name: Young Emissary
cards.flavor_txt: If i acquit myself well, perhaps next they'll post me somewhere civilized.

cards.name: Zerrikanian Fire Scorpion
cards.flavor_txt: The Zerrikanian Desert used to be a lush garden. Then these came along.

cards.name: Eredin - Commander of the Red Riders
cards.flavor_txt: It is unavoidable.

cards.name: Eredin - Bringer of Death
cards.flavor_txt: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.

cards.name: Eredin - Destroyer of Worlds
cards.flavor_txt: I've long awaited this...

cards.name: Eredin - King of the Wild Hunt
cards.flavor_txt: Go on. Show me your spins, pirouettes and faints. I want to watch.

cards.name: Eredin Bréacc Glas - The Treacherous
cards.flavor_txt: I'm enjoying this. You are my toy.

cards.name: Arachas
cards.flavor_txt: Ugly - nature's way of saying 'Stay the fuck away.'

cards.name: Arachas
cards.flavor_txt: Ugly - nature's way of saying 'Stay the fuck away.'

cards.name: Arachas
cards.flavor_txt: Ugly - nature's way of saying 'Stay the fuck away.'

cards.name: Arachas- Behemoth
cards.flavor_txt: Like a cross between a crab, a spider... and a ploughin' mountain.

cards.name: Botchling
cards.flavor_txt: Admit your mistakes and bury them proper - else they'll come back to haunt you.

cards.name: Celaeno Harpy
cards.flavor_txt: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies... they feed on dreams.

cards.name: Cockatrice
cards.flavor_txt: Born of an egg laid by a cockerel... if you believe such peasant drivel.

cards.name: Crone - Brewess
cards.flavor_txt: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you will make.

cards.name: Crone - Weavess
cards.flavor_txt: I sense your pain. I see your fear...

cards.name: Crone - Whispess
cards.flavor_txt: I'd be your best - and last.

cards.name: Draug
cards.flavor_txt: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.

cards.name: Earth Elemental
cards.flavor_txt: How to fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.

cards.name: Endrega
cards.flavor_txt: The nest! Take out the nest, or the bastards'll just keep coming!

cards.name: Fiend
cards.flavor_txt: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.flavor_txt: Fire is so delightful.

cards.name: Foglet
cards.flavor_txt: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.

cards.name: Forktail
cards.flavor_txt: Fork tails... Bah! Fuckers' tails're more like cleavers.

cards.name: Frightener
cards.flavor_txt: 'What have I done?' the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.

cards.name: Gargoyle
cards.flavor_txt: Ancient sculptors' nightmarish fantasies, brought to life by bored mages.

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.flavor_txt: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life... then it's a damn vicious circle.

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.flavor_txt: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life... then it's a damn vicious circle.

cards.name: Ghoul
cards.flavor_txt: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life... then it's a damn vicious circle.

cards.name: Grave Hag
cards.flavor_txt: Their long tongues're for slurping marrow - and whipping prey.

cards.name: Griffin
cards.flavor_txt: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.

cards.name: Harpy
cards.flavor_txt: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.

cards.name: Ice Giant
cards.flavor_txt: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.

cards.name: Imlerith
cards.flavor_txt: Ladd nahw! Kill them! Litter the earth with their entrails!

cards.name: Kayran
cards.flavor_txt: Kill a kayran? Simple. Take your best sword... then sell it and hire a witcher.

cards.name: Leshen
cards.flavor_txt: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village starves.

cards.name: Nekker
cards.flavor_txt: Damn things are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.

cards.name: Nekker
cards.flavor_txt: Damn things are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.

cards.name: Nekker
cards.flavor_txt: Damn things are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.

cards.name: Plague Maiden
cards.flavor_txt: The sick rave about a boil-pocked woman surrounded by herds of rabid rats...

cards.name: Vampire - Bruxa
cards.flavor_txt: A vile, bloodthirsty, man-eating hag. Kind of like my mother-in-law.

cards.name: Vampire - Ekimmara
cards.flavor_txt: Who would think overgrown bats would have a taste for gaudy jewelry?

cards.name: Vampire - Fleder
cards.flavor_txt: Higher vampires embrace their victims. Fleders rip them to shreds.

cards.name: Vampire - Garkain
cards.flavor_txt: Blood-drinkers and corpse-eaters so foul their very ugliness paralyses foes.

cards.name: Vampire - Katakan
cards.flavor_txt: Drinking the blood of the Continent since the Conjunction.

cards.name: Werewolf
cards.flavor_txt: Wolves aren't as bad as they say. Werewolves, though - they're worse.

cards.name: Wyvern
cards.flavor_txt: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.

cards.name: Toad
cards.flavor_txt: Big. Bad. Ugly. Squats in the sewers.

cards.name: Francesca Findabair - Queen of Dol Blathanna
cards.flavor_txt: Ash shall fertilize the soil. By spring, the valley shall bloom once more.

cards.name: Francesca Findabair - the Beautiful
cards.flavor_txt: The Elder Races have forgotten more than humans can ever hope to know.

cards.name: Francesca Findabair - Daisy of the Valley
cards.flavor_txt: Do not let my beauty distract your aim.

cards.name: Francesca Findabair - Pureblood Elf
cards.flavor_txt: To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human oppression's cruel finale.

cards.name: Francesca Findabair - Hope of the Aen Seidhe
cards.flavor_txt: Daede sian caente, Aen Seidhe en'allane ael coeden...

cards.name: Ciaran aep Easnillien
cards.flavor_txt: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.

cards.name: Barclay Els
cards.flavor_txt: Our mead smells like piss, do it? Easy to fix - I'll break your fuckin' nose!

cards.name: Dennis Cranmer
cards.flavor_txt: I know how to carry out orders, so you can shove you advice up your coal chute.

cards.name: Dol Blathanna Archer
cards.flavor_txt: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.

cards.name: Dol Blathanna Scout
cards.flavor_txt: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like cold-hearted bastards.

cards.name: Dol Blathanna Scout
cards.flavor_txt: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like cold-hearted bastards.

cards.name: Dol Blathanna Scout
cards.flavor_txt: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like cold-hearted bastards.

cards.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
cards.flavor_txt: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.

cards.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
cards.flavor_txt: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.

cards.name: Dwarven Skirmisher
cards.flavor_txt: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.

cards.name: Eithné
cards.flavor_txt: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold-forged steel.

cards.name: Elven Skirmisher
cards.flavor_txt: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

cards.name: Elven Skirmisher
cards.flavor_txt: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

cards.name: Elven Skirmisher
cards.flavor_txt: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

cards.name: Filavandrel aen Fidhail
cards.flavor_txt: Though we are now few and scattered, our hearts burn brighter than ever.

cards.name: Havekar Healer
cards.flavor_txt: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you, though.

cards.name: Havekar Healer
cards.flavor_txt: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you, though.

cards.name: Havekar Healer
cards.flavor_txt: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you, though.

cards.name: Havekar Smuggler
cards.flavor_txt: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.

cards.name: Havekar Smuggler
cards.flavor_txt: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.

cards.name: Havekar Smuggler
cards.flavor_txt: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.

cards.name: Ida Emean aep Sivney
cards.flavor_txt: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.

cards.name: Iorveth
cards.flavor_txt: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.

cards.name: Isengrim Faoiltiarna
cards.flavor_txt: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.flavor_txt: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.flavor_txt: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.flavor_txt: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.flavor_txt: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Mahakaman Defender
cards.flavor_txt: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle - we slash straight at their knees!

cards.name: Milva
cards.flavor_txt: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.

cards.name: Riordain
cards.flavor_txt: Stare into their eyes, feast on their terror. Then go in for the kill.

cards.name: Saesenthessis
cards.flavor_txt: Beautiful, pure, fierce - the perfect icon for a rebellion.

cards.name: Toruviel
cards.flavor_txt: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes... But you reek, human.

cards.name: Vrihedd Brigade Recruit
cards.flavor_txt: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.

cards.name: Vrihedd Brigade Veteran
cards.flavor_txt: Vrihedd? What's that mean? Trouble.

cards.name: Vrihedd Brigade Veteran
cards.flavor_txt: Vrihedd? What's that mean? Trouble.

cards.name: Yaevinn
cards.flavor_txt: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.

cards.name: Berserker
cards.flavor_txt: Kill, crush, cleave!

cards.name: Birna Bran
cards.flavor_txt: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.

cards.name: Blueboy Lugos
cards.flavor_txt: I'm damn near ready to puke from boredom.

cards.name: Cerys
cards.flavor_txt: They call me Sparrowhawk, know why? Because I eat rats like you for breakfast.

cards.name: Clan Brokva Archer
cards.flavor_txt: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces. Me, too. In a storm.

cards.name: Clan Dimun Pirate
cards.flavor_txt: Can see the fear in their eyes. Fear o' me... fear o' Clan Dimun!

cards.name: Cerys - Clan Drummond Shield Maiden
cards.flavor_txt: They'll shatter on our shields like waves on a rocky shore.

cards.name: Cerys - Clan Drummond Shield Maiden
cards.flavor_txt: They'll shatter on our shields like waves on a rocky shore.

cards.name: Cerys - Clan Drummond Shield Maiden
cards.flavor_txt: They'll shatter on our shields like waves on a rocky shore.

cards.name: Clan Heymaey Skald
cards.flavor_txt: The deeds of Clan Heymaey will go down in history.

cards.name: Clan Tordarroch Armorsmith
cards.flavor_txt: Ye're in for a pundin'.

cards.name: Clan an Craite Warrior
cards.flavor_txt: I'll bring the an Craites such glory, bards'll go hoarse singin' me praises!

cards.name: Donar an Hindar
cards.flavor_txt: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.

cards.name: Draig Bon-Dhu
cards.flavor_txt: Hear ye now the tale of the heroic deeds of Clan an Craite.

cards.name: Ermion
cards.flavor_txt: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.

cards.name: Hemdall
cards.flavor_txt: When the time of the White Frost comes, Hemdall will sound the call for battle.

cards.name: Hjalmar
cards.flavor_txt: Instead of mournin' the fallen, let's drink to their memory!

cards.name: Holger Blackhand
cards.flavor_txt: Now let's drink to Emperor of Nilfgaard - may his prick forever stay limp!

cards.name: Kambi
cards.flavor_txt: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.

cards.name: Light Longship
cards.flavor_txt: Escape them? In the waters of Skellige? Good luck.

cards.name: Madman Lugos
cards.flavor_txt: WAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!!

cards.name: Mardroeme
cards.flavor_txt: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same...

cards.name: Olaf
cards.flavor_txt: Many've tried to defeat Olaf. But won't hear about it from them - they're dead.

cards.name: Skellige Storm
cards.flavor_txt: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.

cards.name: Svanrige
cards.flavor_txt: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.

cards.name: Transformed Vildkaarl
cards.flavor_txt: Saw them fight once in my life... and once was enough.

cards.name: Transformed Young Vildkaarl
cards.flavor_txt: Rooaaaar!

cards.name: Udalryk
cards.flavor_txt: Haaaargh! After me, if ye've the bollocks!

cards.name: War Longship
cards.flavor_txt: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.

cards.name: Young Berserker
cards.flavor_txt: Want some?

cards.name: Crach an Craite
cards.flavor_txt: A king's gotta be wise. A king's gotta command respect. A king's gotta have stones.

cards.name: King Bran
cards.flavor_txt: No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try.

cards.name: Schirru
cards.flavor_txt: Time to look death in the face.
